pr_title: Improve List IDP endpoint with addtional query param called ''requiredAttributes"

timeline.message: Fix wso2/product-is#7823 issue in IDP REST API
Fix https://github.com/wso2/product-is/issues/7864, support requiredAttributes in list IDP.

timeline.bodyText: we can use StringUtils.split and void if (StringUtils.isNotBlank(requiredAttributes))  check
timeline.author: emswbandara

replies.bodyText:
StringUtils.split(requiredAttributes, ",") will return null if requiredAttributes is null.
Arrays.asList(StringUtils.split(requiredAttributes, ",")) will thow NPE if StringUtils.split(requiredAttributes, ",") return null, so we need to add null check.
replies.author: sarubi

replies.bodyText: this is generated code, do we need to alter it?
replies.author: sarubi
